name: SlipNFlop
description:
Slip N Flop

Slip N Flop is a challenging 3d platformer, overcome the obstacles and get to the finish line! Enjoy funny ragdoll physics as our hero Max gets pummeled everywhere whenever you get hit.

Easy to learn but difficult to master, each level brings new gameplay mechanics and challenges you will have to adapt in order to beat.

Welcome to the simulation.

Hello Max,

Thank you for participating in our physics simulation experiment. You have been chosen thanks to your incredible mental fortitude and motor skills.

Watch your speed and momentum as you try to avoid all the traps and challenges each level presents.

Your skills and patience will be tested to the limit.

 IN DEVELOPEMENT

The game is currently in developement, at the moment there are two episodes available with 10 levels each . New maps and episodes will be added in the future,  any bugs encountered will be fixed in due time, thanks for giving the game a chance!

INSTALLATION GUIDE

1.Extract the file

2.Launch SlipNFlop.exe

3.Suffer

4.Enjoy the sense of satisfaction when you beat a tough level

5.Suffer some more
